attributes.review: The terms on the privacy policy clearly state that Donald J Trump can free-fully send n*des to you through the app!!! I’m absolutely outraged when I found that my thirteen year old daughter could be in such danger. This whole heartily deserves a negative stars review but I’ll settle for the one star.
attributes.title: Unbelievable

attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. It glitches out my phone for days. I’d buy a new phone with the stimulus check, except I never got one. Now I have a phone that won’t stop glitching even after removing the app.
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: i was hoping by downloading this app that i would be close to our lord and savior, president donald j trump, but i was met with poor and the most disappointing app i ever downloaded onto my iPhone 6s. this app was so terrible that i’m not even sure if i’m a supporter of donald j trump anymore.
attributes.title: absolutely terrible

attributes.review: This app is awful... I’ve never really been one to listen to reviews but DO IT. I haven’t stopped getting texts from unknown numbers since I downloaded it... the five star reviews CANNOT be real, definitely bots because this app blows.
attributes.title: Terrible...

attributes.review: I downloaded this app looking for the contract tracing function that we were told the government has been working on to save lives across the nation. It’s supposed to be available now. But it’s not.
attributes.title: Not what I expected.

attributes.review: I got this app so that way I could praise my Cheeto daddy 🍆👅🍆👅I was very disappointed to immediately have to give personal info 😭😭 what about my right to privacy🤫🤫🤫I was so ready to hear why bunker baby is the best 🥰🥰🥰and totally not a fascist racist rapist 😤😤😤 Sad 😢😢😢
attributes.title: Very disappointed

attributes.review: Gives good insight on the upcoming election and what kind of platform the party stands for. I would strongly suggest this app!
attributes.title: Trump 2020

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I fully support Sex Offenders like Trump! Grab me by the Püssÿ, am I right!?!? But then this miraculous thing happened... the more I used this app, the more orange I became! It’s like, an infection, that has spread all over... I just ... oh god! It’s taking over me!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: This app turned me orange!

attributes.review: I was lead to believe that this app would help me build a bunker to escape the danger of people who have different beliefs than me or at least give me an in to a child sex trafficking ring. Only gave me a sense of entitlement and thinly veiled hatred of people of color.
attributes.title: Misleading information!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and Trump instantly knocked on my door— of course I let him in for some coffee. He told me he prefers cold brew and then killed my entire family and my dogs. I was skeptical at first... also the app is very glitchy so I’m rating it one star.
